abstract: Prince Walid bin Talal has announced a $300 million investment in the social media site Twitter, as he continues to expand his holdings in the United States.
snippet: Prince Walid bin Talal has announced a $300 million investment in the social media site Twitter, as he continues to expand his holdings in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Prince Walid bin Talal of Saudi Arabia has taken a $300 million stake in the social media start-up Twitter, adding an emerging brand name to an international investment portfolio that largely includes established giants like Apple, Citigroup and Walt Disney.

headline.main: Saudi Prince Invests $300 Million in Twitter

byline.original: By Evelyn M. Rusli and Mark Scott
